availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Newton Dean in Mercer County, Kentucky, on March 10, 1845. Mother of John Dean, James Dean, William Dean, Job Dean, Milton Dean, Albert Dean, and Norton Dean. Resident in Mercer County in 1850. Resident in Frankfort in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer, District 2, p. 312A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin, Frankfort, p. 278.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin, Market House, p. 171B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191859.
